mapper.select: SELECT U.US_NAME,D.DI_NAME AS SEX,U.US_AGE,U.US_PHONE FROM T_USER U INNER JOIN T_DICT D ON D.DI_CODE = U.US_SEX INNER JOIN T_CARD C ON C.CA_USER_ID = U.US_ID INNER JOIN T_MEC_RECORD M ON M.MR_CA_ID = C.CA_ID WHERE D.DI_TYPE = 'SEX' AND M.MR_NUMBER = #{mrNum}
SELECT MR_REQ,MR_GUIDE,TO_CHAR(MR_BIL_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BILTIME FROM T_MEC_RECORD WHERE MR_NUMBER = #{mrNum}

SELECT IR.IR_ITS_NAME,DEP.DEP_NAME,IR.IR_RES FROM T_ITEMS_RECORD IR INNER JOIN T_MEC_RECORD MR ON MR.MR_ID = IR.IR_MR_ID INNER JOIN T_DEPARTMENT DEP ON DEP.DEP_ID = IR.IR_DEP_ID WHERE MR.MR_NUMBER = #{mrNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_MEC_RECORD SET MR_STATE = 4 WHERE MR_NUMBER = #{mrNum}
